import React, { useState }from 'react'; import { Card, Button, CardTitle, CardText, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; function CalculatingDistatance(){ const [distance, updateDistance] = useState({ walking: "0:00", driving: "0:00", flight:"0:00", value:"0:00" }) let km = 1000 let walkingSpeed = 3.6 ; let drivingSpeed = 80; let flightSpeed = 800; const updateValue = ev => updateDistance({ value:[ev.target.value], walking: (+ev.target.value * walkingSpeed / 60 ).toFixed(2), driving: (+ev.target.value / 60 * drivingSpeed / 60).toFixed(2), flight: (+ev.target.value / 60 * flightSpeed / 60 ).toFixed(2) }) return(

Walking Avarage time to reach your destination Driving Avarage time to reach your destination Flight Avarage time to reach your destination
)}; export default CalculatingDistatance
